trans-unit.source: Draws a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Geometry" /> using the specified <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.GeometryDrawing.Brush" /> and <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.GeometryDrawing.Pen" />.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Geometry" /> 和 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.GeometryDrawing.Brush" /> 绘制 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.GeometryDrawing.Pen" />。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Media.GeometryDrawing> class with a <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingBrush> to paint an object with a shape, with an <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingImage> to create clip art, or with a <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingVisual>.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Media.GeometryDrawing>类，该类具有<xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingBrush>来绘制一个形状上，具有的对象与<xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingImage>创建剪贴画，或与<xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingVisual>。

trans-unit.source: Freezable Features
trans-unit.target: Freezable 功能

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Media.GeometryDrawing> is a type of <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object and therefore can be frozen to improve performance.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Windows.Media.GeometryDrawing>是一种<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>对象，因此可以冻结以提高性能。

trans-unit.source: For information about <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> features, such as freezing and cloning, see the [Freezable Objects Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/freezable-objects-overview.md).
trans-unit.target: 璝惠<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>功能，如冻结和克隆，请参阅[可冻结对象概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/freezable-objects-overview.md)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GeometryDrawing" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GeometryDrawing" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GeometryDrawing" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GeometryDrawing" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The brush used to fill this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GeometryDrawing" />.
trans-unit.target: 用于填充此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GeometryDrawing" /> 的画笔。

trans-unit.source: The pen used to stroke this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GeometryDrawing" />.
trans-unit.target: 用于绘制此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GeometryDrawing" /> 的钢笔。

trans-unit.source: The geometry
trans-unit.target: 几何图形

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GeometryDrawing" /> class with the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Brush" />, <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Pen" />, and <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Geometry" />.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GeometryDrawing" />、<see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Brush" /> 和 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Pen" /> 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Geometry" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Brush" /> used to fill the interior of the shape described by this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GeometryDrawing" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Brush" />，将它用于填充此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GeometryDrawing" /> 所描述形状的内部。

trans-unit.source: The brush used to fill this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GeometryDrawing" />.
trans-unit.target: 用于填充此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GeometryDrawing" /> 的画笔。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: 依赖项属性信息

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: 标识符字段

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: 元数据属性设置为 `true`

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: 无

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.GeometryDrawing.Brush" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 标识 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.GeometryDrawing.Brush" /> 依赖项属性。

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GeometryDrawing" />, making deep copies of this object's values.
trans-unit.target: 创建此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GeometryDrawing" /> 的可修改克隆，从而深度复制此对象的值。

trans-unit.source: When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (but they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.
trans-unit.target: 在复制依赖项属性时，此方法会复制资源引用和数据绑定（但可能不再解析），但不复制动画或其当前值。

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: 当前对象的可修改复本。

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property will be <see langword="false" /> even if the source's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property was <see langword="true." />
trans-unit.target: 即使源的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> 属性为 <see langword="true." />，所克隆的对象的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> 属性也将为 <see langword="false" />

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: 此方法用于生成的可修改副本冻结<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>对象 (或任何<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>对象)。

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: 为方便起见，此方法将隐藏继承的强类型实现的版本。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 有关详情，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GeometryDrawing" /> object, making deep copies of this object's current values.
trans-unit.target: 创建此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GeometryDrawing" /> 对象的可修改复本，从而深度复制此对象的当前值。

trans-unit.source: Resource references, data bindings, and animations are not copied, but their current values are.
trans-unit.target: 不复制资源引用、数据绑定和动画，而是复制其当前值。

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: 当前对象的可修改复本。

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property will be <see langword="false" /> even if the source's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property was <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 即使源的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> 属性为 <see langword="true" />，所克隆的对象的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> 属性也将为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: 此方法用于生成的可修改副本冻结<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>对象 (或任何<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>对象)。

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: 为方便起见，此方法将隐藏继承的强类型实现的版本。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 有关详情，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Geometry" /> that describes the shape of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GeometryDrawing" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置描述此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Geometry" /> 形状的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GeometryDrawing" />。

trans-unit.source: The shape described by this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GeometryDrawing" />.
trans-unit.target: 此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GeometryDrawing" /> 所描述的形状。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.target: 获取或设置用于绘制此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Pen" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GeometryDrawing" />。

trans-unit.source: The pen used to stroke this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GeometryDrawing" />.
trans-unit.target: 用于绘制此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GeometryDrawing" /> 的钢笔。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.target: 依赖项属性信息

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: 标识符字段

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: 元数据属性设置为 `true`

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: 无

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.GeometryDrawing.Pen" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 标识 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.GeometryDrawing.Pen" /> 依赖项属性。
